communityImpact.title: Community Impact
communityImpact.subtitle: Making a Difference in Palghar
communityImpact.description: Dr. Aniruddh Bhaidkar has been deeply committed to serving the community, especially the underserved. He has organized and led over 50 dental camps across the Palghar district, offering free dental care to the tribal population and those in need. His efforts continue to make a meaningful difference in promoting oral health and well-being.
